LanguageData.Amphetamine.label: amphetamine
LanguageData.Amphetamine.description: An addictive stimulant. Fills the need for rest, and allows users to work for extended periods without getting tired. Addiction causes reduced mental performance and, sometimes, psychotic breaks with reality.
LanguageData.AmphetamineHigh.label: high on amphetamine
LanguageData.Chemical_Amphetamine.label: amphetamine
LanguageData.Chemical_Amphetamine.description: Because of an amphetamine addiction, this person needs to regularly consume the drug to avoid withdrawal symptoms.
LanguageData.AmphetamineTolerance.label: amphetamine tolerance
LanguageData.AmphetamineAddiction.label: amphetamine addiction
LanguageData.AmphetamineAddiction.stages.1.label: withdrawal
LanguageData.AmphetamineWithdrawal.stages.1.label: amphetamine withdrawal
LanguageData.AmphetamineWithdrawal.stages.1.descripti: I feel all fuzzy and unfocused.
